mapper.select: SELECT c.*, d.member_name FROM (SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT board_id FROM scrap WHERE member_id = #{member_id}) a INNER JOIN board b ON a.board_id = b.board_id) c LEFT OUTER JOIN member d on c.member_id = d.member_id WHERE c.board_title like '%'||#{search}||'%' OR c.board_content like '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY c.board_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scrap VALUES (#{member_id}, #{board_id}, SYSDATE, SEQ_SCRAP.NEXTVAL)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM scrap WHERE board_id = #{board_id} and member_id = #{session_id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(scrap_id) FROM scrap WHERE member_id = #{session_id} and board_id = #{board_id}
